column4: Hey all. Does anyone feel like 9.04 can't multi task worth jack?
Maybe I just don't have enough ram
running fine to me
I have 4 and it's fine to me
your disks might be slow for some reason. check hdparam
sorry, make that hdparm
I don't understand what I'm looking at (hdparm output)
sudo hdparm -i /dev/sdc | grep udma (replace sdc with your disk)
the mode with the * by it is currently in use
sorry. you lost me
did you run that command in a terminal? check out the manpage for hdparm
df / | grep dev | cut -d' ' -f1
disregard previous
I guess disk isn't the problem. video maybe? hard to tell
now what
cross disk I/O off your list. no idea where to go from here. what video card?
using nvidia's own driver, or default nvidia in Xorg?
I have a couple of questionable things happening
no more ideas here. I guess it depends on how slow it actually is.
after grub I get dmi_save_oem_string ...
Then when I shut down / reboot I get like 5 fast pc speaker beeps
google has wielded no firm answers
try disabling PnP in the bios and see if it goes away
? how would that affect firefox?
